name: Escape from Monkey Island
description: Uses the gog.com windows installer to configure scummvm

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  game_id: monkey4
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating the wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES '/DIR=C:/game'
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
